Standard.Name: The Singular Case of the Midshipman 1.2.1.2.1

English.Text: What innovation! A bright young spark applies some of the latest forensic researches. The knife used to cut the midhipman's neck is placed inside an airtight box along with vapours belonging to the doctor. As if by magic, when removed, clear sets of fingerprints appear on the shaft! When the crew prints are taken, the guilty party is collared in the most satisfying modern fashion!
